report.title: Group members
report.description: Lists members of a group which you administer.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM groups g JOIN groups_users gu ON gu.group_id = g.id AND gu.deleted = false JOIN users u ON u.id = gu.user_id AND u.deleted = false JOIN people p ON p.id = u.person_id and p.deleted = false #joins# WHERE g.id = #group_id# AND #website_filter#

column.name: role
column.sql: case when gu.administrator=true then 'Administrator' when gu.id is not null and gu.pending=false then 'Member' when gu.id is not null and gu.pending=true then 'Awaiting approval' else 'Non-member' end
